item.title: Is error_game_js5connect server side or client side?
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“xXThatOneSkaterKidXx, post:3, topic:438407”][quote author=heatrn11 link=topic=541127.msg3963564#msg3963564 date=1333497237]
Well, that means the client can’t connect to the server… Make sure that you portforwarded correctly. And you posted this topic twice.
[/quote]

I know I portforwarded correctly canyouseeme.org tells me so
and I’m pretty sure its a problem in my source or client.[/quote]
make two clients one client with “127.0.0.1” (which will be your client) and another one with your no-ip (which will be other users client.) see if that works.

Read full topic
item.source: Is error_game_js5connect server side or client side?

item.title: Is error_game_js5connect server side or client side?

item.description:
@xXThatOneSkaterKidXx wrote:

heatrn11:

Well, that means the client can’t connect to the server… Make sure that you portforwarded correctly. And you posted this topic twice.

I know I portforwarded correctly canyouseeme.org tells me so
and I’m pretty sure its a problem in my source or client.

Read full topic
